articles.title: New handheld screening device accurately identifies children with amblyopia - News-Medical.net
articles.description: A handheld screening device that detects subtle misalignment of the eyes accurately identifies children with amblyopia (lazy eye), according to a study published in the Journal of the American Association for Pediatric Ophthalmology and Strabismus.
